podcasts and documentaries

25 feb 2012

societytechnologydocumentarypodcast

documentaries

here is a bunch of documentaries which i would like to point out because of their exceptional quality:

space science related documentaries

  • extreme astronomy - horizon: seeing stars. 720p - bbc (very good)

    • http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lnw6jY-iUI8

  • destination titan - bbc very good)

    • http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b0109ccd

  • space shuttle the final mission - bbc

    • http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b012x69w

  • BBC SPACE (very good) but i can’t provide a link as i can’t find any… bummer

    • BBC Space/1 - Star Stuff
    • BBC Space/2 - Are We Alone
    • BBC Space/3 - Staying Alive
    • BBC Space/4 - New Worlds
    • BBC Space/5 - Black Hole
    • BBC Space/6 - Boldly Go

note: for all this nasa missions i wonder how they get all the funding. and why there is so much military involvement (especially in ‘extreme astronomy’)?

energy related

  • feldheim: das erste energieautarke dorf (very good)

    • http://www.anti-atom-piraten.de/2011/04/feldheim-das-erste-energieautarke-dorf/

  • grenzenlose windkraft (3sat documentary about the enercon e126)

    • http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ek_lUxEuwBI

  • alles im griff - arte (very good)

    • http://www.arte.tv/de/2151166,CmC=3785858.html

  • deadly dust - todesstaub uranmunition und ihre folgen (very good)

    • http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GTRaf23TCUI

  • quarks und co : 20110322 and 20110426

    • http://www.podcast.de/episode/2158063/Quarks%2B%2526%2BCo%253A%2B26.04.2011%252C%2BDie%2BAtom-Ruinen%2Bvon%2BTschernobyl%2Bund%2BFukushima/
    • http://www.podcast.de/episode/2109512/Quarks%2B%2526%2BCo%253A%2B22.03.2011%252C%2BMensch%2Bgegen%2BStrahlung/>

  • quarks und co - blackout in deutschland (very good)

    • http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y4knU0b3UiU&feature=player_embedded

  • die wahre geschichte von tschernobyl (one of many versions it seems - still interesting to see the historic images)

    • http://nuoviso.tv/dokumentationen/wirtschaft/288-die-wahre-geschichte-von-tschernobyl

    • http://nuoviso.tv/ has many other interesting and inflammatory documentaries

  • antiatompiraten.de (very good blog about nuclear energy; occasionally contains documentaries which are usually extraordinary)

    • http://antiatompiraten.de/

note: if you are interested in a sustainable concept on how to solve the energy problem with 100% renewables, read the books from hermann scheer:

  • http://www.hermannscheer.de/de/ (very good)

podcasts (audio only)

a few different podcasts i liked very much:

  • paul graham (very good) - wise words, listen carefully!

    • OSCON 2004: http://itc.conversationsnetwork.org/shows/detail188.html

    • OSCON 2005: http://itc.conversationsnetwork.org/shows/detail657.html

  • CRE028 extreme programming

    • http://cre.fm/cre028

  • CRE084 LISP

    • http://cre.fm/cre084

  • seradio-episode84 dick gabriel on LISP (very good)

    • http://www.se-radio.net/2008/01/episode-84-dick-gabriel-on-lisp/
